items.name: Colors
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Colors
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================

###*
* Enumeration containing default colors.
*
* @module gs
* @class Colors
* @memberof gs
* @static
* @final
###
class Colors
    @initialize: ->
        ###*
        * Transparent color.
        * @property TRANSPARENT
        * @type gs.Color
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @TRANSPARENT = new Color(0, 0, 0, 0)
        
        ###*
        * White color.
        * @property WHITE
        * @type gs.Color
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @WHITE = new Color(255, 255, 255)
        
        ###*
        * Black color.
        * @property BLACK
        * @type gs.Color
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @BLACK = new Color(0, 0, 0)
        
        ###*
        * Color used for rain-particles (Weather-Effect).
        * @property RAIN_PARTICLE
        * @type gs.Color
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @RAIN_PARTICLE = new Color(245, 245, 255)
        
        ###*
        * Color used for storm-particles (Weather-Effect).
        * @property STORM_PARTICLE
        * @type gs.Color
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @STORM_PARTICLE = @RAIN_PARTICLE
        
        ###*
        * Color used for the face of snow-particles (Weather-Effect).
        * @property SNOW_PARTICLE_FACE
        * @type gs.Color
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @SNOW_PARTICLE_FACE = new Color(255, 255, 255)
        
        ###*
        * Color used for the edges of snow-particles (Weather-Effect).
        * @property SNOW_PARTICLE_EDGE
        * @type gs.Color
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @SNOW_PARTICLE_EDGE = new Color(255, 255, 255, 0.5)
  
Colors.initialize()  
window.Colors = Colors
gs.Colors = Colors
